headline: 1 Safe-and-Steady Stock with Competitive Advantages and 2 Facing Headwinds
summary: Stability is great, but low-volatility stocks may struggle to deliver market-beating returns over time as they sometimes underperform during bull markets.

raw.headline: 1 Safe-and-Steady Stock with Competitive Advantages and 2 Facing Headwinds

headline: BASF to Sell Majority Stake in Coatings Unit to Carlyle for $6.7 Billion
summary: BASF will keep a 40% stake in the business, which the deal values at $8.91 billion, after the sale is complete.
